Package io.github.tomaso2468.rpgonline.gui.layout

A series of GUI layouts.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Border
    A layout that centres components with a border within another component.
    CornerLayout
    A layout that places UI elements in the corner.
    FillGridLayout
    A layout that splits a container into a grid.
    FlowLayout
    A layout that fills components in the same way English text is written (left to right, going down to the next line when a line is full).
    GridLayout
    A layout that splits a container into a grid.
    Layout
    The base class for layouts.
    ListLayout
    A layout that places components in a vertical list.
    OuterGridLayout
    A layout that spaces components on the outside grid of the screen.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Corner
    An enum for corners.

Package io.github.tomaso2468.rpgonline.gui.layout Description

A series of GUI layouts.
Author:
Tomaso2468
